articles.title: Scientists identify secret ingredient in Leonardo da Vinci paintings
articles.description: "Old Masters" such as Leonardo da Vinci, Sandro Botticelli and Rembrandt may have used proteins, especially egg yolk, in their oil paintings, according to a new study.

articles.title: B.C. non-profit warns of gift card fraud during the holidays
articles.description: A warning for anyone getting or giving a gift card this holiday season: scammers may have already stolen the balance.

articles.title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,400
articles.description: These are the key developments from day 1,400 of Russia’s war on Ukraine.

articles.title: Lethbridge charities reach Christmas Hope fundraising goal
articles.description: The Christmas Hope campaign is a collaborative effort between several charities in Lethbridge and many member organizations say they reached their fundraising goals this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Oversees Test of New Anti-Air Missile, KCNA Says
articles.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un oversaw the testing of a new type of high-altitude, long-range missile, state media reported, ratcheting up tensions after a US nuclear submarine arrived at the South Korean port of Busan a day earlier.

articles.title: Titanium Provides Update Following Continuous Disclosure Review
articles.description: BOLTON, Ontario, Dec. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Titanium Transportation Group Inc. articles.title: Edmonton father dies in hospital E.R. waiting to see a doctor
articles.description: On Monday, Dec. 22, Prashant Sreekumar, 44, had severe chest pains while at work. A client drove him to the Grey Nuns Hospital where he died waiting to see a doctor.

articles.title: Trump-backed Asfura wins Honduras presidency after disputed election - Reuters

articles.title: Downtown Eastside non-profit fills a need, distributing food hampers just in time for Christmas
articles.description: A local non-profit stepped up this week, giving out food hampers in the Downtown Eastside, Strathcona, and Chinatown, just in time for Christmas.

articles.title: Canadian Food Inspection Agency recalls vegan bacon product over undeclared wheat
articles.description: OTTAWA — The Canadian Food Inspection Agency has issued a recall for a vegan bacon product sold in Ontario because it contains wheat, which doesn’t appear on the list of ingredients. The agency says the vegan bacon is sold under the brand Veggie Paradise. It says wheat is an allergen and peopl

articles.title: Family of woman seriously injured in Highway 1 crash says life can change in a moment
articles.description: One person died in the collision on Monday, which involved three vehicles and happened around 7:15 a.m. in the westbound lanes just before the 176th Street exit in Surrey.

articles.title: B.C. man pleads guilty to charges of sextorting teens across Canada
articles.description: Mounties began investigating the case after victims in Nova Scotia, Quebec and Ontario reported being extorted by someone they’d met on social media.

articles.title: Man arrested, charged after alleged Penticton, B.C. sexual assault
articles.description: Police are asking anyone who witnessed the incident in the 200-block of Orchard Avenue or has additional information to contact Penticton RCMP.
